name: parcel-document-blank
description: Blank web project starter-kit with Parcel

scripts.build: rm -rf build && parcel build src/index.pug --out-dir build/ --public-url ./
scripts.dev: parcel serve src/index.pug && parcel watch src/index.pug
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix build origin gh-pages

author: Manz
